code:
export function createFormData(data){let formdata=new FormData();for(const key in data){let value=data[key];let vt=typeof value;// object 형식
if(vt=="object"){// 배열
if(Array.isArray(value))value.map(val=>formdata.append(`${key}[]`,val));else if(value instanceof File)formdata.append(key,value);else formdata.append(key,JSON.stringify(value));}// string 형식
else if(vt=="string"||vt=="boolean")formdata.append(key,value);// 숫자
else if(vt=="number")formdata.append(key,value.toString());else{return formdata;}}return formdata;}
